attributes.action: remove the charitable status of independant schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Independant or private schools are companies. The government provides education free of charge to all children. Because of this, state schools are permitted to purchase their items without VAT. Why should companies such as private schools, who single out only the best to be educated and refuse to accept anyone who may not get the best results, get VAT-free purchases and claim money back from the Government?
